website_summaries.verdict: A sweet treat that doesn't have a lot of sugar, but still fills your chocolate cravings in a gluten-free snack.
pros: Both sweet and salty snack that hits the spot
7 grams of protein in each bar
Sweet taste, but still relatively low on sugar
cons: The bars can get a little hard if they get stale

customer_reviews.title: Best price for multi-pack
customer_reviews.text: These arrived fresh and were exactly the same as I have purchased in stores. The price was better than I’ve found anywhere locally, and this variety box had 3 of my favorites in it. I plan to keep them in my locker at work so I stop wasting money on the vending machine. They are definitely lower in sugar than a lot of the similar products. So long as I’m paying less than $2 a bar for these, I’m satisfied. I was worried about the freshness of this order, especially since they were delivered on a hot, humid day, but they were fine. Will re-order in the future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not what i thought i was getting
customer_reviews.text: they taste stale: hard, dry, tough. i thought they were just fruit and nuts but they are also chocolate which is NOT good for travel as pieces fall and make a mess, label looks just like the fruit/nut kind i got last month on subscribe and save, which don't get me started on how inconvenient that is to use. I doubt i will finish them and certainly won't use them on intended road trip. waste of my money as they are not returnable. Thanks but NO thanks.
customer_reviews.author: deliveryodyssey

customer_reviews.title: JAW CRUNCHING
customer_reviews.text: This review is for "Nuts and Spices Variety Pack", ships from and sold by Amazon. Normally, I love KIND bars, but these were harder than any I've purchased at Costco. I carelessly cracked one of my teeth crunching into one. Also, although well within the expiry date, the Cinnamon Pecan smelled and tasted somewhat rancid. Searching online, I read that pecans become rancid quickly in warm environments, so perhaps storage conditions were less than optimum. Or perhaps it was just the cinnamon combined with my imagination! I purchased a different variety, Caramel Almond & Seat Salt, also ships from and sold by Amazon, and found them very satisfactory. Almost too much so, as I ate three the day they arrived!
customer_reviews.author: samayas

customer_reviews.title: Kills my appetite.
customer_reviews.text: These are LOADED with fat and absolutely crush my appetite. I wake up RAVENOUS and can quickly scarf one of these and down a cup of coffee before heading out for my run. I use these as meal replacement bars, they’re kinda low calorie for that but, they work. I eat one for breakfast and lunch and I’m losing weight. These taste fantastic and keep me full. Finally!
customer_reviews.author: Only Sane Floridian!

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, and good for people watching their blood sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I love these type of Kind Bars and I can't find them except at one local place that is actually a 20 minutes drive away from me. Ordering them here is a good alternative and ALL of the flavors are wonderful. Many are low glycemic, which means if you are insulin resistant or are watching or A1C levels, these digest in your body so that your blood sugar levels do not spike. For me, I can have one for lunch and that's all I need. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: A Wife, Mom, JediTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Yummy To Eat & Better Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I always kept a package of these Kind bars in the bin next to my nursing chair and would munch on them to get a quick snack in when my hands were tied with my daughter. I also send these with my husband in the morning for a breakfast option, as he doesn't care for big breakfast items so this fits the bill. They are incredibly tasty, and easy to throw in your purse, lunch box, or in your vehicle. Obviously they have chocolate so if you keep them at high temperatures the chocolate will melt. I just threw them in the freezer, and once the chocolate was re solidified I took them out to munch on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle In Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Good selection, great price on subscribe and save, and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for someone who needs to carefully watch what they eat. She loves the taste, as a matter of fact these are her favorite of all that I buy her. The subscribe and save price is considerably less than the dollar and a half that my grocery charges, so that's a big plus, but like all subscribe and save you have to be diligent at watching the prices, they can skyrocket in the blink of an eye. If you need a truly healthy granola type bar that actually tastes good, I'd recommend getting these.
customer_reviews.author: StoneHenge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent taste and gluten free
customer_reviews.text: I have these ordered as a subscribe-and-save item every other month. They are a great gluten-free snack! They are also a perfect size and do not easily warm up and melt if carried in a pocket. Both of my school-aged daughters and my gluten-sensitive husband love these. Kind also is a company that prides itself on using good, wholesome ingredients. I find that the variety pack is also ideal for the price and for the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely eat anything that is prepackaged. I am that person who tries to always eat whole, organic foods and I do a lot of food prepping. I was looking for something that I could stick in a drawer at work, in my purse or in my hiking backpack for those times when I am really hungry and can't stop and make something. The ingredients are readily identifiable (no weird chemicals), they are really tasty and one will satisfy hunger for quite a while. They can be expensive when you buy individually in a store but buying by the case is much cheaper. I like the variety pack, every flavor is good.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Mostly happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy for discovering these bars, being on a Keto diet. I bought a few boxes, so I never run out. However, I grabbed one yesterday and there was something horribly off! I almost gagged and had to spit it all out in the sink. It tasted like a bit into a turd!! Seems that Quality Control missed that one. I threw it away before even checking to see what could have been in it (cockroach?) I will probably put it down as one of the worst things I've ever tasted. I will keep eating them but with hesitancy, since I do not want to taste that flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Tremper

customer_reviews.title: OK, but won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: First time trying these and I am not impressed. The taste was ok, but nothing astonishing. The bars were pretty hard when biting into them from the “glue” holding them together. The chocolate was melted when I took them from sitting in my mailbox, but once they were in the house for some time that was ok, just stuck to the wrapper. Won’t be adding these in my backpack when I go hiking though. Too messy with the chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Cali-life

customer_reviews.title: Great snack and great tastes.
customer_reviews.text: great to have in your purse when hunger hits. I am post cancer and if I get too hungry, nausea can take hold.So, I eat one of these and I am set for a few hours. Perfect! My only complaint is that they use Canola oil, there is no such thing as a Canola, it is a made up name for a high temperature process to get oil out of the rape seed. They need to do better here. And I have called them on it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I just received my second box of these bars. I mainly use them for day hikes -- sticking a couple of them into my pack's waist belt pocket along with some pretzels. I've never eaten anything like them. They are just exceptionally good. I'm a low carb person (not full keto diet, but elements of it) and these fill the bill for low carbs (5 g) but great taste. I will keep a supply on hand into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alder Stone

customer_reviews.title: Stale nuts make the bars unpalatable.
customer_reviews.text: Stale nuts make bars unpalatable. The package arrived with the best by date in the well in the future however the nuts are already stale and rancid. Substandard quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagoland

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: This box contains snacks of 3 different flavors. They taste fresh and delicious. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: KS Shopper

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite bars! Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Kind bars have become my favorite bars, they have a lot of variety with options of Gluten Free and Less Sugar. I always keep a bar in my purse and every time I need a snack this is just great to have, flavorful and filling.
customer_reviews.author: Vanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: Bought for me, but my kids got a hold of them and they were gone in 2 days! Needless to say, they were delicious! Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Quiesha G.

customer_reviews.title: Low GI
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good as a fulfilling quick snack for those on the go who are also concerned about nutrition. The variety pack allows one to try three different bars, my preference is the maple pecan, but all three were very good. I am ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to bite into.
customer_reviews.text: These are very hard to bite into. At first I thought I had a bad box having tried other Kind bars. Nope, I fear that I will ruin my teeth on these bars. Taste is fine, just difficult to chew. I really tried to like them but had to stop my auto delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: ... is not very pleasant but that's because I don't like maple. The other two flavors are very good
customer_reviews.text: The maple flavor is not very pleasant but that's because I don't like maple. The other two flavors are very good. The amazing thing about KIND bars is they have a huge amount of dietary fiber in them, something most of us are missing in our diets because we eat so much (awful) processed food. One of these a day will really help -- and it tastes good. How can you beat that?
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Yumm, but healthy...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best nuts bars I have eaten. Even tough I do not like bars that contain chocolate, these are clearly the exception. The texture is crisp and the flavor slightly sweet, just the right balance. You really taste how healthy they are, but it is hard to explain. The maple one is just paradise although sweeter than the chocolate ones.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: clearly old - hard, crunchy, and dry
customer_reviews.text: I have bought all three flavors included in the variety pack at the grocery store regularly, but out of convenience ordered them on Amazon. They were just delivered today and I ate one, and nearly cracked a tooth they are so hard! I have never found Kind bars to be hard, crunchy, etc. but I just had the most rock hard granola bar of my life. Will definitely not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Love

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to have a box with variety of bars. Very good taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cuca

customer_reviews.title: Love these Kind bars
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to try the Kind bars but was to expensive at our local stores. To me this is a great value for the bars. I liked all three flavors. I was especially surprised I liked the one with cinnamon. I don’t really care for cinnamon but it not over baring in these bars just enough you know it’s there. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavors
customer_reviews.text: I have to force myself to eat snacks throughout the day. These bars make it a lot easier do to so. I really enjoyed the flavors, nothing was too overpowering. They came fresh and tasting just as they would if purchased in the store. Will buy again. Great value and nice flavor combination.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavors and mix of KIND bars
customer_reviews.text: This arrived fast without defects or damage. Excellent mix of flavors on this set. A must try very complex flavor profiles and wholesome good. My whole family enjoyed these.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: KIND Nuts and Spices bars are the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I love nuts and when they have chocolate on them, they are the very best. I wish one could buy just a box of all Dark Chocolate, nuts and sea salt rather than the three type combination. They are very low carbs and a great treat for me on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: cripskid

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is great! I simply wish that they offered more competitive prices.
customer_reviews.author: LISA Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I could not locate these bars locally so was delighted to order from Amazon. These bars are the perfect thing for traveling as they are delicious and filling! And a great treat when using as a substitute for a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Scragg

customer_reviews.title: Chewy
customer_reviews.text: Based on the KIND bars I've had, they're usually relatively crunchy/solid, but the ones I received were very chewy and soft. I'm not sure if that's just how they are now. Also, it stuck to the wrapper and I had to scrape off the chocolate. I think I may just buy them from the store unless I'm in a hurry and have no other choice.
customer_reviews.author: TheLittleShopper

customer_reviews.title: I like the bars very much
customer_reviews.text: My comments are the same as the last review of the KIND bars. I like the bars very much. I like the different flavors, and I love the slogan "ingredients you can see and names you can pronounce," Whoever thought of this slogan should get a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Margoni

customer_reviews.title: A delicious, satisfying joy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being diabetic, sweet & low carb offerings are almost non-existant! A friend told me about KiND bars she found at Wal-Mart & I ried them & even shared with my diabetic pastor. Wal-Mart doesnt always have then though😣. Found them on Amazon & at a better price & quick delivery & am reordering a box of 12 again, but this time I'll have to hide them from my teen age grandkids, because they loved them & my bix if 12 disappeared quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived totally melted and stuck to wrappers.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these bars are really great but one big problem if you live in an area where the climate is warm such as we do in Florida, forget buying this. Our package arrived totally melted and all stuck to their wrappers and no good. Perhaps during cooler months down here this would have been fine but not during warm season which is most of the year here.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and product was fresh off the shelf
customer_reviews.text: These bars are naturally more difficult to chew (relatively speaking) due to the characteristics of the ingredients,. The bars I ordered were not old and absolutely delicious! I’m always nervous about shopping for food online. No worries here!
customer_reviews.author: Chrys Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to bite
customer_reviews.text: Sent them to a shut in senior friend. She said they were so hard she could only break off little tiny pieces. She had never had them before and said they tasted good, just too hard
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Low Carb
customer_reviews.text: I eat these because they have a lot of protein in the nuts and are fairly low in carbs/sugar. I am diabetic so it works out well. There are so mainly flavors in both this package and others. Many are the traditional sweet flavors but some are smoky bbq or jalepeno style also.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Q.

customer_reviews.title: ... flavors of Kind bars before and knew that I liked them.
customer_reviews.text: I've had all of these flavors of Kind bars before and knew that I liked them.. was happy to find a cheaper "bulk" option on Amazon, since I've been buying 2 or 3 a week at work at normal retail pricing. The variety pack option is great. I really prefer the low sugar bars, they provide a semi sweet afternoon pick me up without giving me a sugar rush or crash. Would definitely order this again and am considering a subscription.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: I like KIND bars
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase and mine were fresh. I like to have a variety and these were a great price. However, when I went to order another box the price went up so I opted to just buy a 12 pack of just one flavor which was a couple of dollars cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: DJG

customer_reviews.title: The are a quality on the go snack, and decilious!
customer_reviews.text: I love this quality on the go snack, not only are they delicious, they have great for you ingredients. I love the dark chocolate, the variety of crunchy nuts like almonds are my favorite. I love it that they are pre wrapped you don't have to go digging in the box. They are easy and fun to eat. It feels like I'm treating myself when I have one... or share one,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars and they come in several different flavors! They are so easy to eat on the run and I use them often for breakfast in the car and they will stay with you til lunch time!
customer_reviews.author: Sudie

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: Nice pick me up between meals. I suspect that the dark chocolate bar would melt if left too long in a bag on a warm day. Other than that this product is a great healthy fill-in as a snack between meals
customer_reviews.author: Q-ster

customer_reviews.title: Some flavors are better than others, but the nutritional factor evens them out, to me.
customer_reviews.text: There are a few different ones, but I think the one I had last was dark chocolate and nuts, caramel/almond and cinnamon and nuts. The one I like best of those three is the caramel/almond. Sometimes I quite like the other two and sometimes not in the mood for those two flavors.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually a little disappointed, I thought they would taste much better then they do, only one flavor was actually good.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F

customer_reviews.title: Good between meal snack
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting. Keeps the hungries away between meals. Sometimes used for a meal replacement. Very filling and satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Gabbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a healthy balanced snack paired with fruit or cheese
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nuts and Spices variety of Kind Bars. I discovered them when I was watching my sugar intake and had gestational diabetes. They are a good balance of fiber and low sugar...and they taste great! Perfect to pair with a piece of fruit or some cheese for a healthy balanced snack.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Aull

customer_reviews.title: Yum! But a bit too hard/crunchy
customer_reviews.text: Love kind bars! This flavor has a great balance of sweet and salty! And keeps me going when I'm late for lunch/dinner. BUT.. It's a bit too hard on the teeth, my spouse and kids couldn't bite into it
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Protein bar mailed to military son
customer_reviews.text: Protein bars from here can be mailed Prime to your military kids. You need the military address APO.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvPrime

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: I guess its compact size is good for traveling. We carry them when going out on the mountains. We don’t eat a formal lunch just take a bite or two of these bars when skiing. But have to say, it tastes horrible...
customer_reviews.author: M. Cassani

customer_reviews.title: Always a great pick me up
customer_reviews.text: Like the variety pack! I can keep a box in my backpack and at work for a quick pick me up! Doesn't taste like cardboard and the nuts are crisp and crunchy. The perfect blend of sweet and salty!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Yummy bars w/o a lot of chocolate
customer_reviews.text: We love these as they have minimal amount of chocolate. I like the combination too. Chocolate ones I get from other stores sometimes. But these ones in Bulk are only available in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Narayan Reddy

customer_reviews.title: This is my second order
customer_reviews.text: Kind bars are the perfect take along when a snack is needed. Being diabetic they work well with my glucose level too. Most "health" bars leave a lot to be desired in the taste and texture, but not these Kind bars. I intend to keep a supply on hand.
customer_reviews.author: L. Faye

customer_reviews.title: Dark chocolate is the best one
customer_reviews.text: The dark chocolate sea salt is the best thing ever, other flavors my kids don’t like. Great snack for school only 5 grams sugar and a ton of protein!
customer_reviews.author: Lyzz808

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes these ( So do I ) and this is a good way to get a variety of flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I keep a couple in my duffel bad and computer case
customer_reviews.text: Added to my nutrition plan as a mid-day snake or lunch replacement. I keep a couple in my duffel bad and computer case. When I am running appointments and cannot stop, makes a great snake. Not too dry alone, you dont need a ton of water as on some snack bars. Does a good job suppressing appetite for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Watson3915

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a 0 I would. They left them in the hot sun and they completely melted. And no returns possible. Ridiculous!!!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Perfect for travel, snack or when you need a pick me up. I gave a 4 on value for money. I think pricing is too high. Otherwiae, I would buy more often. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie J

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, healthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars. Love the non processed ingredients. They are a little more expensive than some bars but cheaper than most all natural bars. My only problem is hiding them from the kids.
customer_reviews.author: CityMominWoods

customer_reviews.title: Meh - too much chocolate
customer_reviews.text: The only one I really like is the pecan one. The other 2 have chocolate drizzled over them and underneath. I don't know why everything has to be chocolate covered anymore. I now just bite off the top and throw the under chocolate part away. A waste of 1/4 of a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie M

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good variety pack. Great for a snack on the go or an extra protein serving. Kids love it too
customer_reviews.author: Wianca

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition at good price
customer_reviews.text: These bars are both delicious and nutritious. Price is significantly lower than in supermarkets.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to a candy bar for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and help with my diabetes. Eat as a snack & sugar is still within range ( keeps hunger at Bay also). Only wish that they had these flavor in the mini's 😟
customer_reviews.author: Patricia King-Robinson

customer_reviews.title: On The Go Snack
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine first introduced me to this brand of snack bars. I love the 'nuttiness' and flavor of them. They are a great mid-morning or afternoon snack. Love the variety of flavors that are in this box without having to buy them individually at the store. My family really likes them. Convenient on-the-go snack.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Super worth it and so yummy
customer_reviews.text: These are some of my FAVORITE bars. Seriously I could eat these every day.
customer_reviews.author: T.G.

customer_reviews.title: Rated 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the kind bars all of them are awesome. It’s a great way to start ur day off and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Harris

customer_reviews.title: A step or two+ above granola bars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and you will find full nuts at times - nice and chunky full of great ingredients! Delicious! Wish they were a little less expensive & why I cannot but too often, but do love them when I do!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy's Office Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Great snack!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. I bought in bulk here because my grocery store doesn’t sell in bulk and I was really happy. These are my perfect snack for traveling or when I have to be out of the house before bfast
customer_reviews.author: HeyAliJayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DELISH & PLEASE POWER COST
customer_reviews.text: DELISH...PLEASE LOWER THE COST FOR US WHO LOST JOBS!!!!! OR JUST NEED YOUR KINDNESS TY
customer_reviews.author: steve spahr

customer_reviews.title: my newly discovered delicious treat!
customer_reviews.text: Kind Bars are a wholesome, yummy treat for on the go. A bit on the pricey side however....but excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: Yes they are smaller than most and cost more. We like they are made with whole nuts, fruits and no cakey binder. Some also have dark chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I am now a fan of Kind, and it's the only candy bar I eat. All the flavors taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmar

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bargain and fast delivery of this product. I am about to order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie J. Fairley

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I really Love these!! I try to keep a box handy at all times. If eating in the car make sure you have wipes or napkins.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: These were fresh & Yummy. Will keep ordering for sure
customer_reviews.author: linda courtney

customer_reviews.title: dry and hard to chew - tastes ok
customer_reviews.text: Just ate my 1st bar and it tastes ok. It's dry and hard to chew compared to the other I just reviewed a while ago. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Maix

customer_reviews.title: It isn't health food, but beats other candies.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them and counts them as a healthy snack. I,on the other hand, think they are overpriced candy. But she enjoys them, so we will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: These bars are wonderful. They are healthy and taste so good you think you must be cheating on your diet to eat these!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Good bars
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase the bars before and now on subscribe and save. They are good to eat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and it's healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Doesn't taste like cardboard or overly processed with the unnecessary preservatives. Taste like wholesome healthy food and the dark chocolate variety is sinfully delicious yet healthy! No guilt eating these sweet bars.
customer_reviews.author: Weekly Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Great afternoon snack or hiking food.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of flavor, chew and crunch to satisfy your cravings!
customer_reviews.author: Linda.........

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: These are so tasty and not unhealthy. Loved finding a variety pack and it was about the same price as the grocery store. A little less. Some foods I find here are WAY more costly than the grocery store, so this was a pleasant find.
customer_reviews.author: Irishlazz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Subscribe and Save-ALL PRICES GO UP AFTER SUBSCRIBING
customer_reviews.text: Love these, would be better if Amazon wasn’t notorious for raising prices on subscribe and save items after adding. Seems really fishy that 100% of the items added to subscribe and save all went up in Price More than 30% ?
customer_reviews.author: Shawn O

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are worth the buy. All bars are delicious. Fast shipper, good condition.
customer_reviews.author: P.L.F03

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a good price and assortment. Certainly makes grabbing a quick snack easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Pfishon16

customer_reviews.title: product old
customer_reviews.text: product was outdated and spoiled. Made us sick eating them. Should get a refund
customer_reviews.author: White Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and great taste
customer_reviews.text: The nuts are fresh! The bars are crunchy with perfect amount of sweetness! It is just a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Love them has the protein I need and not the sugar. I am ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars - very tasty - love the combination of the nuts and dark chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! They are a bit pricey, but YOLO. 😆
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Yum! Less sugar. Be “Kind” and eat these with a flavored coffee or tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customerfrances Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: good and low sugar
customer_reviews.text: a better choice for a snack on the go or when traveling; tasty; filling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: All the Kind bars I bought were delicious. I use them as a dessert option while dieting and trying to keep sugar at a minimum. Only wish they were a big better price-wise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging  was very professional  and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Yummy and a perfect treat for hiking, camping, travel, work snack or riding out Hurricane Dorian
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Kind Bars
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of these but it cause a reaction as if I had taken a laxative. I was looking for a low-sugar, healthy snack that tastes well and agrees with my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brown

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: It is Delicious and addictive. Kroger sells it at a much higher price, so I buy it here.
customer_reviews.author: Double L

customer_reviews.title: Purchasing for good health is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I wish they weren't as pricey as they are. But, they are a healthy treat when I can afford them. Thank you for making a quality product that is tastey and less than 11 ingredients!!
customer_reviews.author: E Fay Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Tried....
customer_reviews.text: Meh - Not my favorite kind bar I've ever had but they're OK and I'll finish the box eventually
customer_reviews.author: Motz

customer_reviews.title: Best snack on Earth!
customer_reviews.text: Taste is great...easy to take with you. All healthy ingredients and you get a bit of a sweet fix. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Lora C

customer_reviews.title: Low in suggar
customer_reviews.text: Healthy dark chocolate and nuts. I eat one every day.
customer_reviews.author: Emory

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, doesn’t travel well if not kept from the heat, gets sticky when too warm!
customer_reviews.author: Nowell Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These things are good. Nice morning snack when I have to travel.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rudnicke

product_meta.title: KIND Bars, Nuts and Spices Variety Pack, Gluten Free, Low Sugar, 1.4 Ounce Bars, 12 Count
product_meta.description: Size:12 Count (Pack of 1)| Pattern Name:BarsThese bars are where our journey started and it was simple: whole ingredients like nuts, mixed with fruits and spices bound together with honey.
feature_bullets: Contains 12 - 1.4oz KIND Bars - Maple Glazed Pecan & Sea Salt, Dark Chocolate Nuts & Sea Salt, Dark Chocolate Cinnamon Pecan (4 of each flavor)
3 delicious bars, all 5g of sugar or less, in one convenient snack-packed box
Healthy AND tasty? Check. Sweet AND salty? Check. Dark Chocolate Nuts And Sea Salt AND Madagascar Vanilla Almond? Check. This box truly has it all.
Gluten free, No Genetically Engineered Ingredients, 0g Trans Fat, Kosher
Low glycemic index, low sodium, good source of fiber (see nutrition facts for fat content)

KIND Nuts & Spices bars are finely crafted from the highest quality whole nuts and nature's most delicious spices. Each seemingly indulgent recipe provides all natural protein, fiber and only 5g of sugar (or less). And nothing artificial.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
